descriptionEmployers: Project Management (related to human resources, recruitment, nursing education, language formation/training)

line1.title: Coordination with Local Partners
line1.description: Collaborate with local schools, institutions, associations, and other partners to establish strong recruitment networks.

line2.title: Project Presentation and Targeting
line2.description: Craft and deliver compelling project presentations targeting the most suitable profiles for your organization's needs.

line3.title: Job Description Establishment
line3.description: Develop detailed job descriptions for each category, outlining roles, responsibilities, and required qualifications.

line4.title: Candidate Profiling
line4.description: Identify and target the most suitable candidate profiles, including those with at least a B1 language certificate or a willingness to learn the required language level.

line5.title: Qualification Assessment and Candidate Selection
line5.description: Conduct thorough assessments of candidate qualifications and skills to select the most suitable candidates for your positions.

line6.title: Language Formation Monitoring
line6.description: Monitor candidates' language formation progress and performance based on the agreed-upon language training program.

line7.title: Document Collection for Recognition
line7.description: Assist candidates in gathering necessary documents for recognition and certification in their respective fields.

line8.title: Visa Application Assistance
line8.description: Guide candidates through the visa application process in their home country, providing comprehensive support and guidance.

line9.title: Information Communication to Recruits
line9.description: Communicate all necessary information, requirements, and expectations clearly to recruits throughout the recruitment and relocation process.

line10.title: Continuous Candidate Support
line10.description: Provide continuous support to candidates from contract signing to relocation, ensuring a smooth transition to their new roles in the target country.

slogen.line1: “ We believe in pushing boundaries of what’s possible.
slogen.line2: We are a team of experts committed todelivering outstanding results . ”

getInTouch: Get In Touch: Reach Out To Us Today
